content: wipe down dishes stoves and countertops with this durable crochet cloth that effortlessly tackles messy jobs stitched in lily sugar n cream the original pattern features row of simple single_crochet for the diamond-like textured surface we stitched select row in treble_crochet around the post of a stitch 3 row below a single color really makes the 3d motif pop so select any shade you like pattern includes a stitch key for more visual crocheters yarns for models lily® sugar n cream® super size™ solids 4 oz/113 g 190 yds/174 m ombres & prints 3 oz/85 g 143 yds/131 m sonoma 18004 1 ball or 70 yds/65 m or jade mist 18813 1 ball or 70 yds/65 m note 1 ball will make 2 dishcloths
